content:
I'm so glad to hear that your mom is doing well after her knee replacement surgery! It's wonderful that you were able to take care of her during her recovery. Caregiving can be a challenging but rewarding experience, and I'm sure your mom appreciates all the love and support you've provided.

It's great that you're looking forward to getting back to normal soon. Remember to prioritize your own health and well-being, too, especially after taking care of your mom. Don't hesitate to reach out for help or support if you need it.

Remember, taking care of yourself is essential to maintaining your physical and mental health. Make sure to schedule time for self-care, exercise, and relaxation. You deserve it!

Keep me updated on your progress with the lactose-free diet and protein powder, and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or concerns. You got this!

Wishing you and your mom all the best for a speedy recovery and a return to normalcy soon!
